sources.title: Happy Landing (1934) ADVENTURE
sources.description:
Director: Robert N. Bradbury
Stars: Ray Walker, Julie Bishop, William Farnum, Noah Beery

A young pilot fights to track down a dangerous gang of smugglers and clear his name of an undeserved stigma.

metadata.Plot: An action-filled film with outlaws-of-the-clouds at war with the men of the U. S. Flying Service. A young pilot, Nick Ferris, fights to track down a dangerous gang of smugglers and clear his name of an undeserved stigma.
metadata.Writer: Stuart Anthony, Frances Hyland, Gordon Rigby
metadata.Actors: Ray Walker, Julie Bishop, William Farnum
